def find_second_lowest_grade_students(records):
    grades = sorted(set((grade for (name, grade) in records)))
    second_lowest_grade = grades[2]
    second_lowest_students = [name for (name, grade) in records if grade == second_lowest_grade]
    second_lowest_students.sort()
    return second_lowest_students

mutants.code:
def find_second_lowest_grade_students(records):
    grades = sorted(set((grade for (name, grade) in records)))
    second_lowest_grade = grades[1]
    second_lowest_students = [name for (name, grade) in records if grade != second_lowest_grade]
    second_lowest_students.sort()
    return second_lowest_students
